definition: affairs of life/things of the world
surname Shi
life/age/generation/era/world/lifetime/epoch/descendant/noble
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
to consider oneself above worldly matters (idiom)

sentences.english: Like every paradigm throughout history, at some point or another, things change.
sentences.chinese: 正如历史上所有的范例一样，世事常变，无物永驻。

sentences.english: Who would have thought things are unpredictable, they are also very pick.
sentences.chinese: 谁知世事难料，她们也都很挑。

sentences.english: Now we are entering the third and final year of His earthly ministry.
sentences.chinese: 如今我们进入祂在世事奉的第三年，也是最后一年。

sentences.english: Through the world, see light the world.
I don't believe in the no-win scenario.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信世事会完全没有可胜之机。

sentences.english: It is far preferable take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
sentences.chinese: 耐心镇静地接受世事变迁，是最好的处事之道。

sentences.english: While some things may pass away, you know that our love and affection will not.
sentences.chinese: 世事难料，惟有我们的爱和情感不变。

sentences.english: The unsophisticated brute preferred to let his weapon do the talking.
sentences.chinese: 这个不谙世事的畜生更喜欢用武器说话。

sentences.english: That article things clarity all learning.
sentences.chinese: 世事洞明皆学问，人情练达即文章。

sentences.english: You never know where you might end up.
sentences.chinese: 世事难料，你永远也不会知道最后你会去哪里。

sentences.english: Students shouldn't be only bookworms on campus; they should be informed of what's going on in the world.
sentences.chinese: 学生不应只是象牙塔里的书虫，他们应该了解世事。

sentences.english: Difficult since the vast world expected, chuenchouanan sleep alone.
sentences.chinese: 世事茫茫难自料，春愁黯黯独成眠。

sentences.english: I can only see in this world, wandering in the passage.
sentences.chinese: 我只能在徘徊在此岸，看沧海桑田，世事变迁。

sentences.english: How could these ancient pianos have survived the vicissitudes of life?
sentences.chinese: 世事多变迁，这些钢琴是如何幸存至今的呢？

sentences.english: They scattered and cultural stories in a refined performance of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他们在散文化小说中表现出了脱俗的世事。
